name: WORLDWIDE
description:
*Use Headphones For Better Experience

Worldwide

Inspired in word scramble genre, Worldwide challenges you to find the correct location in each level. Learn, discover and "travel" to new places.

How to play

Use left click on mouse to swap letters to find the correct location. Use key R to reset the level. Use customized hints for each location if you get stuck. Game only playable in English.

Credits

A four-day long challenge game made by Marco Nicolau(@nicolaumarco). Art by freepik and smashicons. Music: Adventure by Bensound. Special thanks to Iris, Jumpermind and all testers.

Thanks for playing. Enjoy :)
